name: Acton Lane Power Station
description: A former power station in London, used as a filming location for notable movies.

content.title: Overview
content.body: **Acton Lane Power Station** was a coal-fired power station in London, England. It supplied electricity to the London area and was operated by the Central Electricity Generating Board.

content.title: Film History
content.body: Acton Lane Power Station hosted scenes from several notable films. It doubled for the 'Axis Chemicals' in Tim Burton's 1989 film _Batman_, where it was used to depict the exterior scenes of the chemical plant.

content.title: Visiting
content.body: The power station no longer operates and does not offer public tours. It has been largely demolished and redeveloped over the years.
